function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex ebbs and flows of air temperature and relative humidity within office buildings","Impact":"Potential for discomfort and reduced health and wellbeing of occupants","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and calibration of HVAC systems to ensure consistent and comfortable indoor conditions","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC control systems with fine-grained regulation capabilities","People":"Occupants of office buildings","Owner":"Building management and facilities maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Unprecedented insight into commercial office building IEQ performance through environmental monitoring and building operations","Impact":"Improved building performance and occupant satisfaction, health, and wellbeing","Mitigation":"Regular analysis of the environmental data to identify areas for improvement and optimization","Technologies":"Integrated building management systems with real-time data analytics capabilities","People":"Building owners, operators, and facilities management teams","Owner":"Building owners, facilities management teams"},{"Description":"Highly localised environmental sensors capable of monitoring individual occupant exposure","Impact":"Enhanced ability to tailor indoor environmental conditions to individual needs and preferences","Mitigation":"Integration of sensor data into personalized environmental control systems","Technologies":"Smart building technologies with personalized environmental control capabilities","People":"Individual occupants","Owner":"Building management and facilities maintenance teams"}]}
